channel.title: Fitness on Jeff Cavanagh
channel.description: Recent content in Fitness on Jeff Cavanagh

item.title: Endgame
item.description: I put this workout together in the summer of 2019. At its core it is an upper/lower split. The week is formatted as two iterations of a lower body day, an upper body day, and a dynamic, multifunctional day. The reps vary slightly on a bi-weekly basis depending on which movements are the primary emphasis. Week 1 Monday: Compound Lower Body Warmup: TRX Squat 2 x 10 Explosive Movement: Box Jump 3 x 3-5 Font Squat 5 x 4-6 TB Deadlift 3 x 8-10 Superset x 3 Goblet Squat x 12-15 DB RDLs x 10-12 Cooldown: Mobility work / Roll Legs / Stretch Tuesday: Compound Upper Body Warmup: Superset x 2 Plyo-pushups x 5 Face Pulls x 10 Explosive Movement: Push Press 3 x 3-5 Pullups (weighted) 4 x 4-6 DB Bench 4 x 4-6 DB Row 3 x 8-10 Triset x 3 Standing Arnold Press x 8-10 DB Hammer Curls x 6-8 DB close-grip Pushups x 15-20 Superset x 3 Inclince DB Bench x 12-15 Incline Lever Rows x 10-12 Cooldown: stretch/hang Wednesday: Sprint/Core SPRINT 8 Landmine 180s 4 x 10-12 Superset x 3 Standing Rollouts x 6-10 Decline (weighted) Situps x 10-12 Superset x 3 Hanging Leg Raises x 8-10 Cable Crunch x 15,12,10 (Opt) Finisher: Core Tabata (1 - 2) Cooldown: stretch Thursday: Uni-Lateral Lower Body Warmup: Walking Warmup Front Squat Reverse Lunge 3 x 4-6 Single Leg Barbell RDL 3 x 8-10 Bulgarian Split Squat 3 x 15,12,10 Glute-Ham Raise 3 x 10 Finisher: Farmerâ€™s Walks (EMOM, Tabata, minute bursts) Cooldown: Mobility work / Roll Legs / Stretch Friday: Uni-Lateral Upper Body Warmup: Superset x 2 Plyo-pushups x 5 Face Pulls x 10 One-Arm Pushups 3 x 6-10 Freestanding DB Row 3 x 6-8 Superset x 3 Kneeling Banded Pushdowns x 15-30 Dips x 10-12 Superset x 3 Chinups x 6-10 Smash Curl x 10-12 Single-Arm Overhead Press 3 x 10-12 Cooldown: stretch/hang Saturday: Multifunctional SPRINT 8 Complex (Pick one from list below) Chinup + Pushup (10,20;8,16;6,12;4,8;2,4 for time) Sprint Tabata (opt) extra Tabata or full body conditioning (Sled Push, Farmers Walks, etc.
